trans-unit.source: A bitmap effect that paints a drop shadow around the target texture.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
A value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
The default is 5.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.BlurRadius"></xref> dependency property.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of this instance.
The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
The clone's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property is `false`.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Gets or sets the color of the drop shadow.
The color of the drop shadow.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Colors.Black"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Color"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the direction of the drop shadow.
The direction of the drop shadow, in degrees.
The default is 315.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Direction"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the opacity of the drop shadow.
The opacity of the drop shadow.
The default is 1.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Opacity"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias"></xref> value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias.Performance"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.RenderingBias"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the distance of the drop shadow below the texture.
The distance of the drop shadow below the texture.
The default is 5.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.ShadowDepth"></xref> dependency property.
